fullText: Blair Underwood brings a welcome thoughtfulness to Stanley, making him more than a brute in a torn T-shirt. His take emphasizes the character's cunning intelligence.
dtliExcerpt: Blair Underwood brings a welcome thoughtfulness to Stanley, making him more than a brute in a torn T-shirt. His take emphasizes the character's cunning intelligence.
bwwExcerpt: But Stanley also needs to have a feral charm and a touch of insecure neediness — otherwise, it’s hard to see why he’d feel threatened by Blanche, or why Stella would stay with this wife-beater in wife-beaters. Unfortunately, Underwood sticks to one note, and that’s brutish. Even then, it often feels as if we’re watching a fundamentally nice actor baring his teeth — and his chest — to look mean. Stanley’s rage at the world doesn’t come from deep inside.
showScoreExcerpt: Blair Underwood brings a welcome thoughtfulness to Stanley, making him more than a brute in a torn T-shirt. His take emphasizes the character's cunning intelligence.
